description: Leyla G¨¹ven, an ex-MP for the opposition HDP party, is convicted of membership of a terrorist group.
title: Leyla G¨¹ven: Turkey sentences Kurdish politician to 22 years in prison
title_page: Leyla G¨¹ven: Turkey sentences Kurdish politician to 22 years in prison - BBC News
maintext: G¨¹ven's whereabouts after Monday's sentencing were not clear. However, police sources quoted by AFP news agency said she had been held during a search of a HDP lawmaker's home in the predominantly Kurdish city of Diyarbakir and was being taken to prison.
